description:
On executing nova keypair-list, the following error gets generated:

nova keypair-list
ERROR (ClientException): Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<class 'sqlalchemy.exc.OperationalError'> (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-5ff60d4d-67e3-4f2d-9912-fd4dcb833165)
title: nova keypair-list generates ERROR (ClientException): Unexpected API Error.

comments.content:

Serguei
